accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the multi-agent system.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the logic and reasoning steps taken by the multi-agent system to arrive at the final answer.

completeness.description: The extent to which the multi-agent system's response addresses all aspects of the question.

time_efficiency.description: The amount of time taken by the multi-agent system to provide an answer.

robustness.description: The multi-agent systemâ€™s ability to handle diverse and challenging questions without failure.

data_quality.description: The quality and reliability of the data sources used by the multi-agent system to inform its reasoning.

scalability.description: The capability of the multi-agent system to maintain performance as the complexity or number of tasks increases.

user_interaction.description: The effectiveness of communication between the multi-agent system and the user throughout the task.
